item.title: [sld] Dark Ritual
item.description:
Instant

Add {B}{B}{B}.

item.title: [sld] Temporal Manipulation
item.description:
Sorcery

Take an extra turn after this one.

item.title: [sld] Midnight Reaper
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Knight

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Seize the Day
item.description:
Sorcery

Untap target creature. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sld] Field Marshal
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

item.title: [sld] Doubling Cube
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Double the amount of each type of unspent mana you have.

item.title: [sld] Doubling Cube
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Double the amount of each type of unspent mana you have.

item.title: [hho] Chaos Wrap
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library. Then they may look at the top card of their library and may wrap it. If it's a permanent card, they may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, they may put it onto the battlefield face down as a 4/4 red Present creature. (To wrap a card, put it inside lots of sleeves. If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a sleeve from it instead.)

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1597315035352551425

item.title: [j22] Exsanguinate
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

item.title: [j22] Explorer's Scope
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [j22] Expedition Map
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [j22] Evolving Wilds
item.description:
Land

{T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [j22] Eternity Snare
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Eternity Snare enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.title: [j22] Erdwal Illuminator
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever you investigate for the first time each turn, investigate an additional time.

item.title: [j22] Epicure of Blood
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Enlarge
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

item.title: [j22] Engulfing Slagwurm
item.description:
Creature — Wurm

Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

item.title: [j22] Endless Ranks of the Dead
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.

item.title: [j22] Endbringer
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi

Untap Endbringer during each other player's untap step.

{T}: Endbringer deals 1 damage to any target.

{C}, {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

{C}{C}, {T}: Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Emiel the Blessed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Unicorn

{3}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G/W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If it's a Unicorn, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. ({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)

item.title: [j22] Emancipation Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

item.title: [j22] Elvish Warmaster
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever one or more other Elves enter the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

{5}{G}{G}: Elves you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Elven Bow
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Elven Bow enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token, then attach Elven Bow to it.

Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has reach.

Equip {3}

item.title: [j22] Elite Instructor
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Elite Instructor enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

item.title: [j22] Electrify
item.description:
Instant

Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [j22] Electric Revelation
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards.

Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.)

item.title: [j22] Elderleaf Mentor
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

When Elderleaf Mentor enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [j22] Edifice of Authority
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Target creature can't attack this turn. Put a brick counter on Edifice of Authority.

{1}, {T}: Until your next turn, target creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated. Activate only if there are three or more brick counters on Edifice of Authority.

item.title: [j22] Might of the Masses
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Eaten Alive
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.

Exile target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [j22] Dwynen's Elite
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [j22] Duskshell Crawler
item.description:
Creature — Insect

When Duskshell Crawler enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

item.title: [j22] Durable Coilbug
item.description:
Creature — Insect

{4}{B}: Return Durable Coilbug from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [j22] Dune Beetle
item.description: Creature — Insect

item.title: [j22] Drudge Beetle
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [j22] Drowsing Tyrannodon
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

Defender (This creature can't attack.)

As long as you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Drowsing Tyrannodon can attack as though it didn't have defender.

item.title: [j22] Drownyard Explorers
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Drownyard Explorers enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [j22] Dread Slaver
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Dread Slaver this turn dies, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

item.title: [j22] Dread Rider
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Knight

{1}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target opponent loses 3 life.

item.title: [j22] Dreadhound
item.description:
Creature — Demon Dog

When Dreadhound enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

Whenever a creature dies or a creature card is put into a graveyard from a library, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Dreadful Apathy
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

{2}{W}: Exile enchanted creature.

item.title: [j22] Drannith Stinger
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Whenever you cycle another card, Drannith Stinger deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [j22] Drag Under
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Dragonspeaker Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Human Barbarian Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [j22] Dragon's Hoard
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.

{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Mage
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Wizard

Flying

Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

item.title: [j22] Dragonlord's Servant
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Fodder
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Fodder
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Egg
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Egg

Defender

When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
